distribution_pattern: WA State only
product_description: Label reads in part "***Panzanella Bread Company Italian Peasant Bread 24 oz. ***INGREDIENTS:  Unbleached enriched wheat flour (Niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, frolic acid, enzyme, ascorbic acid [dough conditioner]), Sea Salt (Salt, magnesium carbonate) Canola Oil, Olive Oil Yeast (Sorbitan monosterate, ascorbic acid)***    Please note there are spelling error contained in the ingredient statement (frolic), commas are missing between ingredients, and capital letters are sometimes used.
